name: hearts
description: server and client for hearts game

scripts.clean: npm run clean-client && npm run clean-server
scripts.build-client: cd client && npm install && npm run build && mkdir -p ../server/build/client && cp -r ./build ../server/build/client && cp -r ./public ../server/build/client
scripts.build-server: cd server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build-client && npm run build-server

author: Oliver Pavletic
